item.title: RMS OFFICIALLY PRESENTS TLD 90 TABLES FOR HIV/AIDS PROGRAM PROCURED UNDER TRMS PROJECT
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Rwanda Medical Supply on January 19th ,2022 celebrated the first achievement in procuring 349,393 bottles of Tenofovir/Lamivudine/Dolutegravir (TLD – B/90) tablets for HIV/AIDS program in Rwanda. The TLD 90 tablets were
item.content:encoded:
Rwanda Medical Supply on January 19th ,2022 celebrated the first achievement in procuring 349,393 bottles of Tenofovir/Lamivudine/Dolutegravir (TLD – B/90) tablets for HIV/AIDS program in Rwanda.

The TLD 90 tablets were procured under the Transforming Rwanda Medical Supply Chain (TRMS) project, which funded by the United States Agency for International Development (USAID).

The Chief Executive Officer Pie Harerimana said “the event highlighted TRMS successes to execute TLD procurement on time; RMS is committed and will continue to implement all TRMS activities, and we are looking forward to celebrating more Milestones and success stories in the next 5 years”

On his part Dr. Corneille Ntihabose, Head of Department of Clinical and Public Health services at the Ministry of Health said “it is indeed an honor to see that Rwanda Medical Supply under the USAID funded TRMS project which was launched last year, has delivered such a huge quantity of TLD 90 tablets

item.title: UNFPA HANDS OVER COVID-19 PREVENTIVE COMMODITIES TO RBC THAT WILL BE GIVEN TO 44 ISANGE ONE STOP CENTERS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The UNFPA Monday this week, handed over hand sanitizers, surgical masks and medical gloves to Rwanda Biomedical center in a bid to jointly fight the spread of the pandemic. The
item.content:encoded:
The UNFPA Monday this week, handed over hand sanitizers, surgical masks and medical gloves to Rwanda Biomedical center in a bid to jointly fight the spread of the pandemic.

The preventive materials will be used to protect frontline health workers, Gender based Violence service providers and Gender based survivors at 44 Isange One Stop Centers amidst the Covid-19 pandemic

The handover ceremony was held at Rwanda Medical Supply Ltd Central Warehouse in Kigali
